Classes/UICircularProgressRing.html#/s:2.name: pauseProgress()
Classes/UICircularProgressRing.html#/s:2.abstract: Pauses the currently running animation and halts all progress.

Classes/UICircularProgressRing.html#/s:2.name: continueProgress()
Classes/UICircularProgressRing.html#/s:2.abstract: Continues the animation with its remaining time from where it left off before it was paused.

Classes/UICircularProgressRing.html#/s:2.name: resetProgress()
Classes/UICircularProgressRing.html#/s:2.abstract: Resets the progress back to the minValue of the progress ring.
